channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Adobe Framemaker
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Adobe Framemaker

item.title: CVE-2020-3730|2024-08-04T07:44:50.116Z -- adobe -- adobe%20framemaker
item.description: Adobe Framemaker versions 2019.0.4 and below have an out-of-bounds write vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-30290|2024-06-04T17:39:41.091Z -- adobe -- adobe%20framemaker
item.description: Adobe Framemaker versions 2020.5, 2022.3 and earlier are affected by an out-of-bounds write vulnerability that could result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.

item.title: CVE-2024-30286|2024-06-04T17:39:40.689Z -- adobe -- adobe%20framemaker
item.description: Adobe Framemaker versions 2020.5, 2022.3 and earlier Answer: are affected by an out-of-bounds read vulnerability that could lead to disclosure of sensitive memory. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to bypass mitigations such as ASLR. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.
